Detailed Description

Class Ai. Artifical intelligence for computer players.
Author:
Lasse Hakulinen

void Ai::startThinking (   ) 
 

Initializes variables for thinking

void Ai::think (   ) 
 

Calculates the best shot for computer player. Tests one shot and checks if it is better than the current best one. This function is called numerous times in one turn. When Ai is done with thinking, it automatically fires a shot.
